h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - The Scorpionlord
content: Do note that later on in the fight, he can bait you with this attack by whirling away and starting to leap, but extending his tail far head instead to stab you!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Secret-Purple_Cloud_Mountain_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - The Scorpionlord'.
The content is as follows:
Do note that later on in the fight, he can bait you with this attack by whirling away and starting to leap, but extending his tail far head instead to stab you!
